search.query: | rest /services/cluster/config | stats values(splunk_server) as splunk_servers by cluster_label | eval servers=mvjoin(splunk_servers, ", ") | fields cluster_label servers

panel.title: Current Estimated Total Size of SmartStore Cache in S3

search.query: index=summary search_name="SmartStore Cache Size" | search orig_splunk_server IN ($cluster$) | stats sum(cm:bucket.estimated_size) as size by _time | chart latest(size) as size | eval size=round(size/1024/1024/1024, 2) | rename size as "Size in GB"

panel.title: Current Estimated SmartStore Size by Index (GB)

search.query: index=summary search_name="SmartStore Cache Size" | search orig_splunk_server IN ($cluster$) | stats sum("cm:bucket.estimated_size") as size by orig_index | eval size=round(size/1024/1024/1024, 3) | rename size as "Size in GB"

index=summary search_name="SmartStore Cache Size" | search orig_splunk_server IN ($cluster$) | stats sum("cm:bucket.estimated_size") as size by orig_splunk_server | eval size=round(size/1024/1024/1024, 2) | rename size as "Size in GB"

panel.title: Size of All Local Cache and Indexed Data by Indexer (GB)

search.query: | dbinspect index=* cached=f | search splunk_server IN ($cluster$) | stats sum(sizeOnDiskMB) as CacheGB by splunk_server, index | eval CacheGB=CacheGB/1024 | xyseries splunk_server, index, CacheGB | rename VALUE_* as *

panel.title: Estimated Total Size of SmartStore Cache in S3 by Index (GB)

search.query: index=summary search_name="SmartStore Cache Size" | search orig_splunk_server IN ($cluster$) | stats sum(cm:bucket.estimated_size) as size by _time, orig_index | eval size=round(size/1024/1024/1024, 2) | xyseries _time orig_index size | rename VALUE_* as *
